name: Its a Pirate-Game!
description:
A pirate game. But you aren't one. You dodge the bullets the pirates fire at you. Survive to succeed. 

::Programming/Art: Panda Bear

::Music: Markositta

 

This game is made from scratch within 6 days. This is only a prototype.

::Use your mouse/WASD keys to play. Default is mouse. Please check help/options if you do not understand something.

::Please consider leaving a nice comment if you enjoyed the game or have any suggestions/complaints. This game is a prototype and will most likely be improved in future.
